original_text: So Elijah went from there and found Elisha son of Shaphat. He was plowing with twelve yoke of oxen, and he himself was driving the twelfth pair. Elijah went up to him and threw his cloak around him.
korean_text: 엘리야가 거기서 떠나 사밧의 아들 엘리사를 만나니 그가 열두 겨릿소를 앞세우고 밭을 가는데 자기는 열두째 겨릿소와 함께 있더라 엘리야가 그리로 건너가서 겉옷을 그의 위에 던졌더니

sentences.original_text: and found Elisha son of Shaphat
He was plowing with twelve yoke of oxen
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 열두 쌍의 소를 몰며 밭을 갈고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: and he himself was driving the twelfth pair
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 열두 번째 쌍을 직접 몰고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: and threw his cloak around him
